concept_to_related_concepts.description: Prompt oficial usado para gerar relações conceito → conceito no SINKT
concept_to_related_concepts.prompt: Learning order relation refers to relationships that establish a sequential and logical flow for mastering various concepts in a subject. For example, in the subject of mathematics, a student needs to understand the concept of 'integers' before moving on to learn about 'fractions'. Now, a student is learning the concept "{{TARGET_CONCEPT}}", which concepts should logically precede this concept to ensure a proper understanding? The candidate concepts are {{CONCEPT_LIST}}. Please choose from the list.

question_to_concepts.description: Prompt inferido para rotular questões com conceitos
question_to_concepts.prompt:
Given the following question:
"{{QUESTION_TEXT}}"
And the list of available concepts:
{{CONCEPT_LIST}}
Identify which concepts this question belongs to. Choose only from the list and output exactly the selected concepts.

concept_to_questions.description: Prompt inferido para gerar relação conceito → questões

extract_slide_elements.description: Prompt do MAIC para extrair conteúdo bruto do slide
extract_slide_elements.prompt: You are an educational content extractor. Given the following slide image or text, extract: all textual content, all visual instructional objects, headings, bullet points, definitions, and key concepts. Output only structured data.

generate_slide_description.description: Prompt do MAIC para gerar descrição estruturada do slide
generate_slide_description.prompt: Rewrite the content of this slide in clear and structured educational prose. Identify and list all key concepts explicitly mentioned or implied in the slide.

generate_knowledge_units.description: Prompt do MAIC para gerar árvore de conhecimento (conceitos hierárquicos)
generate_knowledge_units.prompt: Given the slide text and description, extract all underlying concepts and organize them into a hierarchical knowledge tree. Include parent → child relationships. Output only the concept tree structure.

generate_question_for_concepts.description: Prompt do MAIC para criar questões associadas a conceitos
generate_question_for_concepts.prompt: Generate a question that tests understanding of the following concepts: {{CONCEPT_LIST}}. Ensure the question aligns with the content provided and evaluates conceptual understanding.
